Key Match Events: Senegal scored a resounding 4-0 win over Malawi at Stade Me Abdoulaye Wade on Friday
Sadio Mane increased his lead at the top of the all-time scoring charts with goal number 45 for his country
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal are huge favourites to carry the day here, and unsurprisingly so given their plethora of talent across the pitch
Malawi need a victory to keep their already slim chances of making it through to Africa's biggest football showpiece alive
Post-Match Reflections: Pape Thiaw could not have asked for a better start to life in charge as Senegal secured a resounding win
Malawi's crushing defeat to Senegal was the latest episode of a downward spiral which kicked off in July 2023
Miscellaneous Highlights: Senegal have largely been defensively frugal in that time, letting in just two goals and keeping an impressive five clean sheets
Malawi have conceded 10 goals alreadyâ€”the most in the qualifiers
Others: Nicolas Jackson opened his Senegal account with the fourth of four goals against Malawi, and the Chelsea hitman will be looking to pick up where he left off
